page.title: 07FARMING - Farmer's Year
page.content: {Jan -}Cattle indoors therefore need feeding; sheep outdoors require feed; manure spreading {Feb -}Cows calving Sheep vaccinated & ewes prepared for lambing {March -}Cows calving 1st batch of lambs born {April -}Pens cleaned out & manure spreading; lambing time; cows calving; fields fertilized {May -}Cattle are turned on to fields for grass; land fertilized; lambs wormed {June -}Turnips sown; grass land re- seeded; sheep shearing; prepare for haymaking {July -} Hay Making Sheep dipping {Aug - }Wean lambs from sheep; calves born buy straw for winter bedding
